photos.name: The City of Lights
photos.caption: Know as the City of Lights, this is a central business hub in Al Reem

photos.name: Al Reem at Night
photos.caption: Al Reem at night, featuring the bridged Gate Towers, and the tall Sun Towers

photos.name: The Mangroves at sunrise
photos.caption: The beautiful Mangroves are a central feature of Al Reem Island

photos.name: Kayaks on the beach
photos.caption: The beach and mangroves provide many business opportunities, from kayaking and other water sports, to food trucks and other services.

photos.name: Water Craft Lit up at Night
photos.caption: There is an amazing night life in Al Reem, with the beach and mangroves offering many business opportunities.

photos.name: Al Maryah Island
photos.caption: Just across the water is Al Maryah Island, with great links to Al Reem

photos.name: Sunset over Al Reem and Al Maryah Islands
photos.caption: Sunset over Al Reem and Al Maryah Islands. New development just behind the mangroves offers many new business opportunities.

photos.name: Racing Indoors at Reem Mall
photos.caption: The large Reem Mall makes for the perfect venue for many community events, especially in the hot summer months.

photos.name: Fireworks over Al Maryah
photos.caption: We enjoy amazing fireworks displays over Al Maryah about 4 times a year.

photos.name: Camels in the Desert
photos.caption: With the desert so nearby, there is a great demand for Safaris and Dune Bashing.

photos.name: The Mangroves with Buildings in the Background
photos.caption: The beautiful Mangroves and their wildlife are a central feature of Al Reem Island.

photos.name: Al Reem Canal at Night
photos.caption: The canals meander all around the northern sector of Al Reem Island.
